nodes.bodyText:
IMHO it should be a JSON object not string '{}'.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1303,6 +1303,7 @@ components:
         id: 0
         email: email
         username: username
+        stuff: '{}'

nodes.bodyText: You are correct, but this is generated code, so it must be fixed in the mustache templates, or maybe the Java code. There must be another bug in the existing code that causes this issue. Let me check.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1303,6 +1303,7 @@ components:
         id: 0
         email: email
         username: username
+        stuff: '{}'

nodes.bodyText: This is generated from https://github.com/OpenAPITools/openapi-generator/blob/master/modules/openapi-generator/src/main/resources/go-experimental/openapi.mustache. There must be a problem with the content of the openapi-yaml tag.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1303,6 +1303,7 @@ components:
         id: 0
         email: email
         username: username
+        stuff: '{}'

nodes.bodyText:
Never mind, the generated code is correct and must be within quotes. This is because this line is part of the generated example value.

  
    
      openapi-generator/samples/openapi3/client/petstore/go-experimental/go-petstore/api/openapi.yaml
    
    
         Line 1297
      in
      40470a6
    
    
    
    

        
          
           example:
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1303,6 +1303,7 @@ components:
         id: 0
         email: email
         username: username
+        stuff: '{}'

nodes.bodyText: I am going to mark this issue resolved. Reopen if you have more questions.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1303,6 +1303,7 @@ components:
         id: 0
         email: email
         username: username
+        stuff: '{}'

nodes.bodyText: This was a bug before this PR. There is no markdown file "map[string]interface{}.md"
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -10,12 +10,12 @@ Name | Type | Description | Notes
 **StringProp** | Pointer to **NullableString** |  | [optional] 
 **DateProp** | Pointer to **NullableString** |  | [optional] 
 **DatetimeProp** | Pointer to [**NullableTime**](time.Time.md) |  | [optional] 
-**ArrayNullableProp** | Pointer to [**[]map[string]interface{}**](map[string]interface{}.md) |  | [optional] 
-**ArrayAndItemsNullableProp** | Pointer to [**[]map[string]interface{}**](map[string]interface{}.md) |  | [optional] 
-**ArrayItemsNullable** | Pointer to [**[]map[string]interface{}**](map[string]interface{}.md) |  | [optional] 
-**ObjectNullableProp** | Pointer to [**map[string]map[string]interface{}**](map[string]interface{}.md) |  | [optional] 
-**ObjectAndItemsNullableProp** | Pointer to [**map[string]map[string]interface{}**](map[string]interface{}.md) |  | [optional] 
-**ObjectItemsNullable** | Pointer to [**map[string]map[string]interface{}**](map[string]interface{}.md) |  | [optional] 
+**ArrayNullableProp** | Pointer to **[]map[string]interface{}** |  | [optional]

nodes.bodyText: @spacether , these allowed types would have to be fixed in a separate PR.
